outputs.name: people
outputs.description:
A People object that describes the occupancy of the program. If None,
no people are assumed to occupy the program.

outputs.name: lighting
outputs.description:
A Lighting object that describes the lighting usage of the program.
If None, no lights are assumed to be installed.

outputs.name: electric_equip
outputs.description:
An ElectricEquipment object to describe the usage
of electric equipment within the program. If None, no electric equipment
is assumed to be installed.

outputs.name: gas_equip
outputs.description:
A GasEquipment object to describe the usage of gas equipment
within the program. If None, no gas equipment is assumed to be installed.

outputs.name: infiltration
outputs.description:
An Infiltration object to describe the outdoor air leakage of
the program. If None, no infiltration is be assumed for the program.

outputs.name: ventilation
outputs.description:
A Ventilation object to describe the minimum outdoor air
requirement of the program. If None, no ventilation requirement is
be assumed for the program.

outputs.name: setpoint
outputs.description:
A Setpoint object to describe the temperature and humidity
setpoints of the program.  If None, the ProgramType cannot be assigned
to a Room that is conditioned.

inputs.name: _program
inputs.description:
A ProgramType object or text for the identifier of a ProgramType
to be looked up in the program type library.

name: HB Deconstruct ProgramType
description:
Deconstruct a ProgramType object into its component load objects.
-
